original_text: And he said unto them, Which of you shall have a friend, and shall go unto him at midnight, and say unto him, Friend, lend me three loaves;
korean_text: 또 이르시되 너희 중에 누가 벗이 있는데 밤중에 그에게 가서 말하기를 벗이여 떡 세 덩이를 내게 꾸어 달라

sentences.original_text: Which of you shall have a friend
and shall go unto him at midnight

sentences.korean_translation: 친구여, 나에게 떡 세 개를 빌려다오
